page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart definition dimension string object

property.name: as
property.description: To create a string dimension the value must be "string".

property.name: src
property.description: Where the data for the dimension comes from. Can be a string with property name in the data the dimension is from. An array of property names if the dimension comes from multiple properties in the data. An object where each property name in the object will contain the value of the property name in the data. A function that gets the data and "temp" object and must return the value for the given data.

property.name: values
property.description: An array of the discrete values for the dimension. Additional values that are found will be append to the end. This allows for explicit values to always appear on an dimension even if they are not found in the data.

property.name: sort
property.description: If the strings should to be sorted a boolean of true will sort them alphabetically, or a function may be passed in to do a custom sort.
